page.title: 03Armed Forces continued
page.content:
Upper Heyford Air Base has three squadrons of aircraft stationed there, mainly F111 swing wing fighter bombers plus all the ancillary services e.g. fire, medical and police services.
Being so dominated by the aircraft causes several problems in the area. The most noticeable of these is aircraft noise. An announcement has been made by the Ministry of Defence that grants will be made available to local residents to install sound proofing in their homes. Planning is sometimes refused for new building which is likely to be badly affected by noise.
The number of airmen together with their families far outnumber the local population so stretching housing and services to the limit.
